S.FORM: == satangahan : == alupal u zuma a kamu : nu Hulam a kamu:柿 nu Amilika a kamu:persimmon nu Zipun a kamu:柿 u canan ku alupal a sanek cupelak ku alupal nu Taywan. . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː 柿 persimmon == malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː ==

== satangahan : == alopal o zoma a kamo : no Holam a kamo:柿 no Amilika a kamo:persimmon no Zipon a kamo:柿 o canan ko alopal a sanek copelak ko alopal no Taywan. . namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː 柿 persimmon == malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː ==
